title: Drawing, "Interior of a Man's Living Room", possibly 1853
medium: Brush and watercolor on heavy wove paper
signed: Lower right, in Cyrillic characters in ochre watercolor, and faintly dated: S. Tolstoi 1853 (?)
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Shepherd Gallery, New York
description: This living/ bed room features a curtained archway with a cartouche at the center. The green flowered curtain fabric is matched in the seat furniture and window curtains. The floor is covered with a Persian carpet in a blue and rose floral pattern. An unmade bed at the right, clothes draped over chairs, a nightstand with a candlestick, slippers on the floor and a desk at the widow create a gentleman's work-and-sleep environment.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Interior of a Man's Living Room", possibly 1853.
possibly 1853. Brush and watercolor on heavy wove paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-55.
